title: Fossil Fuel-Funded Super PAC Eyes $11.5 Million Spending Operation for Herschel Walker in Final Days
description:
Leaked documents show the Empowerment Alliance, a dark-money group tied to energy industry, is planning to inject $1.5 million into the Georgia run-off to turn voters out.

The post Fossil Fuel-Funded Super PAC Eyes $11.5 Million Spending Operation for Herschel Walker in Final Days appeared first on The Intercept.

title: The Biden Administration Says Legal Immunity for Saudi Crown Prince Was Unavoidable. Privately, They Weren’t So Sure.
description:
The National Security Council and DAWN, a nonprofit founded by Jamaal Khashoggi, met expressly to discuss the question.

The post The Biden Administration Says Legal Immunity for Saudi Crown Prince Was Unavoidable. Privately, They Weren’t So Sure. appeared first on The Intercept.
